channel.title: humility on LoopedLine
channel.description: Recent content in humility on LoopedLine

item.title: If You Think You're Green, You Grow
item.description: It’s hard to grow when you think you don’t need to. It’s hard to learn when you think you know enough already. Growth, learning, advancement of any kind takes effort, resources, time. You’re not likely to expend that effort unless you think you need to. Learning requires the humility to recognize that you have something to learn. You won’t learn until you try. You won’t try unless you think you need to.
